TopicTitle: I am full of grief and coffee

Articles.Content:
No idea, Eadrom. I couldn't say. Just mentioning that now in case I forgot to PM you back then. I have old man memory.

And just posting into this old thread of mine to show off my current pride and joy. I just managed THIS:

I am weeping with relief. Just getting this far was very difficult.
Nice, but what happened to the chinese dragon rocket?

I am debating between KSP and my Calc midterm(Ultimately the midterm will win) and I went for another sip of coffee and ultimately it was empty. Sad days when the coffee is gone and one cannot kerbal..

For whatever reason I was reminded of this thread and felt the need to share because coffee related.

Space on Kerblers

I am debating between KSP and my Calc midterm(Ultimately the midterm will win) and I went for another sip of coffee and ultimately it was empty. Sad days when the coffee is gone and one cannot kerbal..

For whatever reason I was reminded of this thread and felt the need to share because coffee related.

Space on Kerblers

I'm just curious... but exactly how DOES one fold soup?

Time to show off my first creation in my new minimalist line.

"Whackjob" and "minimalist". Two words I never thought I would see in the same sentence.

Edited June 6, 2014 by kmMango

"Whackjob" and "minimalist". Two words I never thought I would see in the same sentence.

Yeah, I think that means only 5000 parts.

I love seeing how much support was given to Whack early on. So many experienced rocketeers reached out to a newbie to show him the ropes. They didn't shun him for being new. They invited him in to "share the coffee". I felt the same way when I joined and saw how much cooperation there was.

Good lord, that thing is absurd!
Another thing I NEVER thought would be said.
